parameter.value: Hello. How may I help you |PLAYERNAME|? Ask me to {trade} if you would like to buy something. I can also explain the {mail} system.
My name is Benjamin, however not from the Royal Tibia Line.
The mail system? Hmm, you can purchase a {parcel}, {label}, or a {letter} to send information and goods accross the world. Remember to write their name on the first line and their city beneath it!
Frodo? Shh...he may over hear us.
It was a pleasure to help you, |PLAYERNAME|.
Here. Don't forget that you need to buy a label too if you want to send a parcel. Always write the name of the {receiver} in the first line and the name of the {city} in the second line.
